name: Digimix
overview: Digimix is a flex-based editing music application (built on AIR) that will give users the freedom to create and save their own mix project. In fact, users will be able to create a project, save it, close the browser, come back later and re-open the project to continue working on it.

acquisition.source_description: Aviary Acquires Browser-Based Audio Editor Digimix
